Home.des_banner: Learn everything quickly with the Anki
Home.des_at_school: Engaging group and distance learning for teachers and students.
Home.des_at_work: For training, e-learning, interactive presentations and more.
Home.des_at_home: Apps and games for family fun or home study.
Home.des_learning_apps: Engage kids with the Kahoot! family of learning apps
Home.des_why_is_anki_1: Vocabulary packages have been carefully selected and standardized by Anki
Home.des_why_is_anki_2: With smart vocabulary repetition method. Anki will help you focus on the most difficult words for you
Home.des_why_is_anki_3: Just guess the word and swipe left, right, you can quickly master the vocabulary sets
